Entries.Description: The Toolkit Output channel no longer takes focus when credentials profiles are reloaded
"Publish to AWS" experience now supports new regions like Jakarta
Fix issue with icons not correctly handling the dark theme in Visual Studio 2022.
Fixed bug where the "Publish to AWS" experience would not work for users with a space in their Windows profile path
Beanstalk environment variables can now be configured in the "Publish to AWS" experience
Added more validation checks to ECS Fargate and App Runner based targets in the Publish to AWS experience
Menu items for the new (preview) "Publish to AWS" experience and the older publishing experiences are no longer mutually exclusive.
Improved the "Publish to AWS" experience for configuring EC2 Instance Types by adding a selection dialog.
The "Publish to AWS" experience is now capable of publishing applications to existing Beanstalk environments

Added support for credential profiles that use `role_arn` and `credential_source`, where `credential_source = Ec2InstanceMetadata`. This makes it easier to use the Toolkit from within a Windows EC2 instance, since it isn't necessary to place account secrets in the credentials file on the instance.
